triage.rationale: The patient reports a mild headache with a short duration of 1 day. There are no associated symptoms or risk factors mentioned, suggesting it may be a self-limiting condition.
care_instructions: Monitor for worsening symptoms, such as increased severity or new symptoms. Consider over-the-counter pain relief if necessary.
